card.name: AEtherspouts
card.text: For each attacking creature, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of his or her library.

card.name: Act on Impulse
card.text: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way.

card.name: Aegis Angel
card.text: Flying When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel.

card.name: Aeronaut Tinkerer
card.text: Aeronaut Tinkerer has flying as long as you control an artifact.

card.name: Aggressive Mining
card.text: You can't play lands. Sacrifice a land: Draw two cards. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Ajani Steadfast
card.text: +1: Until end of turn, up to one target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike, vigilance, and lifelink. -2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control. -7: You get an emblem with "If a source would deal damage to you or a planeswalker you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage."

card.name: Ajani's Pridemate
card.text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

card.name: Altac Bloodseeker
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, Altac Bloodseeker gets +2/+0 and gains first strike and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Amphin Pathmage
card.text: {2}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Ancient Silverback
card.text: {G}: Regenerate Ancient Silverback.

card.name: Avacyn, Guardian Angel
card.text: Flying, vigilance {1}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to another target creature this turn by sources of the color of your choice. {5}{W}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target player this turn by sources of the color of your choice.

card.name: Avarice Amulet
Back to Nature
card.text: Destroy all enchantments.

card.name: Battle Mastery
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has double strike.

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Belligerent Sliver
card.text: Sliver creatures you control have "This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures."

card.name: Black Cat
card.text: When Black Cat dies, target opponent discards a card at random.

card.name: Blastfire Bolt
card.text: Blastfire Bolt deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.

card.name: Blood Host
card.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Host and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Boonweaver Giant
card.text: When Boonweaver Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your graveyard, hand, and/or library for an Aura card and put it onto the battlefield attached to Boonweaver Giant. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Borderland Marauder
card.text: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Brawler's Plate
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Equip {4}

card.name: Brood Keeper
card.text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Brood Keeper, put a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. It has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Burning Anger
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player."

card.name: Cancel
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Carnivorous Moss-Beast
card.text: {5}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carnivorous Moss-Beast.

card.name: Carrion Crow
card.text: Flying Carrion Crow enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Caustic Tar
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target player loses 3 life."

card.name: Caves of Koilos
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Chandra, Pyromaster
card.text: +1: Chandra, Pyromaster deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player controls. That creature can't block this turn. 0: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. -7: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Charging Rhino
card.text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Chasm Skulker
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Chasm Skulker. When Chasm Skulker dies, put X 1/1 blue Squid creature tokens with islandwalk onto the battlefield, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Chasm Skulker.

card.name: Chief Engineer
card.text: Artifact spells you cast have convoke.

card.name: Chord of Calling
card.text: Convoke Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Chronostutter
card.text: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.

card.name: Circle of Flame
card.text: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you or a planeswalker you control, Circle of Flame deals 1 damage to that creature.

card.name: Clear a Path
card.text: Destroy target creature with defender.

card.name: Cone of Flame
card.text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

card.name: Congregate
card.text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

card.name: Constricting Sliver
card.text: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature an opponent controls until this creature leaves the battlefield."

card.name: Coral Barrier
card.text: Defender When Coral Barrier enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 blue Squid creature token with islandwalk onto the battlefield.

card.name: Covenant of Blood
card.text: Convoke Covenant of Blood deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Crippling Blight
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and can't block.

card.name: Crowd's Favor
card.text: Convoke Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Crucible of Fire
card.text: Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.

card.name: Cruel Sadist
card.text: {B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Cruel Sadist. {2}{B}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Cruel Sadist: Cruel Sadist deals X damage to target creature.

card.name: Darksteel Citadel
card.text: Indestructible {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Dauntless River Marshal
card.text: Dauntless River Marshal gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Island. {3}{U}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Devouring Light
card.text: Convoke Exile target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Diffusion Sliver
card.text: Whenever a Sliver creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Dissipate
card.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Divination
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Divine Favor
card.text: Enchant creature When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

card.name: Divine Verdict
card.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Elvish Mystic
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Encrust
card.text: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Endless Obedience
card.text: Convoke Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Ensoul Artifact
card.text: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact is a creature with base power and toughness 5/5 in addition to its other types.

card.name: Ephemeral Shields
card.text: Convoke Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Eternal Thirst
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has lifelink and "Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Feast on the Fallen
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if an opponent lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Feral Incarnation
card.text: Convoke Put three 3/3 green Beast creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Festergloom
card.text: Nonblack creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: First Response
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Flesh to Dust
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Forge Devil
card.text: When Forge Devil enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to you.

card.name: Foundry Street Denizen
card.text: Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Frenzied Goblin
card.text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Frost Lynx
card.text: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Furnace Whelp
card.text: Flying {R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Gargoyle Sentinel
card.text: Defender {3}: Until end of turn, Gargoyle Sentinel loses defender and gains flying.

card.name: Garruk's Packleader
card.text: Whenever another creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

card.name: Garruk, Apex Predator
card.text: +1: Destroy another target planeswalker. +1: Put a 3/3 black Beast creature token with deathtouch onto the battlefield. -3: Destroy target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness. -8: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn."

card.name: Gather Courage
card.text: Convoke Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Generator Servant
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Generator Servant: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Genesis Hydra
card.text: When you cast Genesis Hydra, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put a nonland permanent card with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle the rest into your library. Genesis Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Glacial Crasher
card.text: Trample Glacial Crasher can't attack unless there is a Mountain on the battlefield.

card.name: Goblin Kaboomist
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a colorless artifact token named Land Mine onto the battlefield with "{R}, Sacrifice this artifact: This artifact deals 2 damage to target attacking creature without flying." Then flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Goblin Kaboomist deals 2 damage to itself.

card.name: Goblin Rabblemaster
card.text: Other Goblin creatures you control attack each turn if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste onto the battlefield. Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

card.name: Gravedigger
card.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Grindclock
card.text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Grindclock. {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of charge counters on Grindclock.

card.name: Hammerhand
card.text: Enchant creature When Hammerhand enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.

Heat Ray
card.text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.

card.name: Heliod's Pilgrim
card.text: When Heliod's Pilgrim enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Hoarding Dragon
card.text: Flying When Hoarding Dragon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle your library. When Hoarding Dragon dies, you may put the exiled card into its owner's hand.

card.name: Hornet Nest
card.text: Defender Whenever Hornet Nest is dealt damage, put that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch onto the battlefield.

card.name: Hornet Queen
card.text: Flying Deathtouch When Hornet Queen enters the battlefield, put four 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch onto the battlefield.

Hunt the Weak
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control.

card.text: Destroy all creatures you don't control and all planeswalkers you don't control.

card.name: Indulgent Tormentor

card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.text: When Invasive Species enters the battlefield, return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Invisibility

card.name: Jace's Ingenuity
card.text: Draw three cards.

card.name: Jace, the Living Guildpact
card.text: +1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard. -3: Return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. -8: Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. You draw seven cards.

card.name: Jalira, Master Polymorphist
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegendary creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Jorubai Murk Lurker
card.text: Jorubai Murk Lurker gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Swamp. {1}{B}: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Juggernaut
card.text: Juggernaut attacks each turn if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

card.name: Kalonian Twingrove
card.text: Kalonian Twingrove's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. When Kalonian Twingrove enters the battlefield, put a green Treefolk Warrior creature token onto the battlefield with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control."

card.text: Flying Whenever Kapsho Kitefins or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.text: Whenever you activate an ability of an artifact, if it isn't a mana ability, you may pay {R}. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.

card.text: +1: Target player discards a card. -2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. -8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Meditation Puzzle
card.text: Convoke You gain 8 life.

card.name: Mercurial Pretender

card.name: Midnight Guard
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Midnight Guard.

card.name: Might Makes Right
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control each creature on the battlefield with the greatest power, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.text: Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, draw a card.

card.name: Nissa, Worldwaker
card.text: +1: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land. +1: Untap up to four target Forests. -7: Search your library for any number of basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Those lands become 4/4 Elemental creatures with trample. They're still lands.

card.text: Convoke As Obelisk of Urd enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +2/+2.

card.text: Other red creatures you control get +1/+1. {R}, {T}: Another target red creature you control gains haste until end of turn.

card.text: Sliver creatures you control have indestructible.

card.name: Solemn Offering
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

card.name: Soul of Innistrad
card.text: Deathtouch {3}{B}{B}: Return up to three target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. {3}{B}{B}, Exile Soul of Innistrad from your graveyard: Return up to three target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Soul of New Phyrexia
card.text: Trample {5}: Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn. {5}, Exile Soul of New Phyrexia from your graveyard: Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Soul of Ravnica
card.text: Flying {5}{U}{U}: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control. {5}{U}{U}, Exile Soul of Ravnica from your graveyard: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control.

card.name: Soul of Shandalar
card.text: First strike {3}{R}{R}: Soul of Shandalar deals 3 damage to target player and 3 damage to up to one target creature that player controls. {3}{R}{R}, Exile Soul of Shandalar from your graveyard: Soul of Shandalar deals 3 damage to target player and 3 damage to up to one target creature that player controls.

card.name: Soul of Theros
card.text: Vigilance {4}{W}{W}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike and lifelink until end of turn. {4}{W}{W}, Exile Soul of Theros from your graveyard: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike and lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Soul of Zendikar
card.text: Reach {3}{G}{G}: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield. {3}{G}{G}, Exile Soul of Zendikar from your graveyard: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Soulmender
card.text: {T}: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Spectra Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from all colors. This effect doesn't remove Auras.

card.name: Spirit Bonds
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield. {1}{W}, Sacrifice a Spirit: Target non-Spirit creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Stab Wound
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Staff of the Death Magus
card.text: Whenever you cast a black spell or a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Staff of the Flame Magus
card.text: Whenever you cast a red spell or a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Staff of the Mind Magus
card.text: Whenever you cast a blue spell or an Island enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Staff of the Sun Magus
card.text: Whenever you cast a white spell or a Plains enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Staff of the Wild Magus
card.text: Whenever you cast a green spell or a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Stain the Mind
card.text: Convoke Name a nonland card. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Statute of Denial
card.text: Counter target spell. If you control a blue creature, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Stoke the Flames
card.text: Convoke Stoke the Flames deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Stormtide Leviathan
card.text: Islandwalk All lands are Islands in addition to their other types. Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.

card.name: Sunblade Elf
card.text: Sunblade Elf gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains. {4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Terra Stomper
card.text: Terra Stomper can't be countered. Trample

card.name: The Chain Veil
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't activate a loyalty ability of a planeswalker this turn, you lose 2 life. {4}, {T}: For each planeswalker you control, you may activate one of its loyalty abilities once this turn as though none of its loyalty abilities have been activated this turn.

card.name: Tireless Missionaries
card.text: When Tireless Missionaries enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Titanic Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Torch Fiend
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice Torch Fiend: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Tormod's Crypt
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

card.name: Triplicate Spirits
card.text: Convoke Put three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Turn to Frog
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

card.name: Tyrant's Machine
card.text: {4}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Ulcerate
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.

card.name: Undergrowth Scavenger
card.text: Undergrowth Scavenger enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Unmake the Graves
card.text: Convoke Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth
card.text: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.

card.name: Venom Sliver
card.text: Sliver creatures you control have deathtouch.

card.name: Verdant Haven
card.text: Enchant land When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Vineweft
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {4}{G}: Return Vineweft from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Void Snare
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wall of Essence
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Essence is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Wall of Fire
card.text: Defender {R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wall of Frost
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Wall of Limbs
card.text: Defender Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Wall of Limbs. {5}{B}{B}, Sacrifice Wall of Limbs: Target player loses X life, where X is Wall of Limbs's power.

card.name: Wall of Mulch
card.text: Defender {G}, Sacrifice a Wall: Draw a card.

card.name: Warden of the Beyond
card.text: Vigilance Warden of the Beyond gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent owns a card in exile.

card.name: Waste Not
card.text: Whenever an opponent discards a creature card, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield. Whenever an opponent discards a land card, add {B}{B} to your mana pool. Whenever an opponent discards a noncreature, nonland card, draw a card.

card.name: Welkin Tern
card.text: Flying Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Xathrid Slyblade
card.text: Hexproof {3}{B}: Until end of turn, Xathrid Slyblade loses hexproof and gains first strike and deathtouch.

card.name: Yavimaya Coast
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Yisan, the Wanderer Bard
card.text: {2}{G}, {T}, Put a verse counter on Yisan, the Wanderer Bard: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of verse counters on Yisan, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Zof Shade
card.text: {2}{B}: Zof Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
